name: Ishem Boumaraf
description: '''Ishem Boumaraf''' is an Algerian singer-songwriter of [[chaouie music]]. He was born in [[Batna, Algeria|Batna]] and he is Originally from [[Tkoutt|T'Kout]]. Ishem was an ex-member of the musical group Tafert. He was [[alumnus]] and at the real time a professor of the regional institute of musical education of Batna.
